SELECT * FROM co_conversation
WHERE (co_conversation.title LIKE ? OR co_conversation.askUserName LIKE ? OR co_conversation.askUserInfo LIKE ? OR co_conversation.answerUserName LIKE ? OR co_conversation.answerUserInfo LIKE ? )
AND (co_conversation.companyId = ?)
AND (co_conversation.status = ?)
ORDER BY co_conversation.askDate DESC

SELECT * FROM co_conversation
WHERE co_conversation.groupId = ?
AND (co_conversation.status != 2)
AND (co_conversation.title LIKE ?)
ORDER BY co_conversation.askDate DESC
